text:
Hello,

we have used apache 2.4.12 version in our product.
we have observed that The Apache service is crashing randomly in some platform(crashing continuously for every two or four hours)

In forum we have studied that this is know bug issue and solution would be apache upgrade from 2.4.12 to 2.4.16.

Now we have migrated from 2.4.12 to 2.4.17(the latest at the time of migration).
But still the issue not resolved. the service is crashing for every two ours.
In this platform we have noted that the service is crashing only when we are using IE 11. Same issue not occurred when we use IE8.

Any one known about this issue?
Still service crash issue is there in Apache? 
Is there any compatibility issue between IE and apache version?

Thanks for support.
creator: sundargandhi5685@gmail.com

text:
(In reply to sundar from comment #0)
> Any one known about this issue?

Which issue precisely are you referring to?
Which fix/CHANGES between 2.4.12 and 2.4.16 was pointed out in the "forum"?
creator: ylavic.dev@gmail.com
